entry.title: I AM STANDING BESIDE U
entry.content:
ä»Šå¤©ç½‘è¯¾è¢«è¡¨æ‰¬äº†...è¿˜æŒºå¼€å¿ƒçš„ğŸ˜†ã€‚

A long time ago, a magician planted a tree. Later the magician died and was buried under that tree. The magical power of the magician was absorbed by the tree, and the tree turned into a house. The books of the magician during his lifetime were all burned, but they were miraculously restored in the tree house. Before Annie and Jack, a knight also entered the tree house and crossed into the Cretaceous. The knight's name is Madeon, and his medal is engraved with M. Unfortunately, the knight failed to return to the normal world and collapsed in the quantum sea.
